call_purpose: troubleshooting slow performance of PC recruiter software
investigating if issue is server-side or local

BUSINESS CONTEXT.Current challenges/pain points: Slow performance issues with PCR and TRG legal database

Resolution_steps_taken: Logged into customer's account to test performance
Recommended restarting router or disabling web protection in virus scanning software
Outstanding_action_items: Customer to check with technology company about recent changes to virus protection
Customer to try restarting router or disabling web protection
RESOLUTION_TRACKING.Next_steps_required: Customer to follow up with results of troubleshooting steps

customer_journey_stage.expansion_opportunities: Potential for additional troubleshooting support or upgraded services

retention_factors.loyalty_signals: Willingness to reach out for support indicates reliance on the service
retention_factors.advocacy_potential: Dependent on resolution of current issues

communication_preferences.decision-making_patterns: Seeks immediate solutions and consults with internal tech support
